messages.subject: Re: Redwall Series
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/16/99 12:47:05 PM EST, Hsmotgo@aol.com writes:  Redwall is a youth
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/16/99 12:47:05 PM EST, Hsmotgo@... writes:

<< what is the Redwall series? I seem to have missed this too! >>

Redwall is a youth fantasy series with mice and other animals. It looks
great! I have just found out about it myself and I know my kids will love it!
It is right up our alley, genre-wise. All you gamers out there should enjoy
these books!
Blessings, Lori in TX

messages.subject: Re: Redwall Series

messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/16/99 11:07:42 AM EST, Monica@... writes:

<< But I've only found the Redwall series in harback around here. >>
what is the Redwall series? I seem to have missed this too!
Teresa

messages.subject: Redwall Series
messages.msgSnippet: I may be way behind the times here... but I ve only found the Redwall series in harback around here.  Yesterday, the entire series was at my local supermarket
messages.messageBody:
I may be way behind the times here... but I've only found the Redwall series in harback around here. Yesterday, the entire series was at my local supermarket in paperback. I don't know if the paperback version is new or not... just know I hadn't seen it before... and thought it was perhaps worth mentioning. :-)

~Monica
